name: __EGameplayEffectGrantedAbilityRemovePolicy
doc: Describes what happens when a GameplayEffect, that is granting an active ability, is removed from its owner.

CancelAbilityImmediately: Active abilities are immediately canceled and the ability is removed.
RemoveAbilityOnEnd: Active abilities are allowed to finish, and then removed.
DoNothing: Granted abilities are left lone when the granting GameplayEffect is removed.
